roleset.name: take back
roleset.note: RESCIND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rescind' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from rescind.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: Nekoosa's poison pill allows shareholders-1 to vote *trace*-1 to rescind it...
